org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainersample
Class ParameterizedTaskQueryDefinition

java.lang.Object
  org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer.LazyQueryDefinition
      org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainer.CritQueryDefinition<Task>
          org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainersample.ParameterizedTaskQueryDefinition
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer.QueryDefinition
public class ParameterizedTaskQueryDefinition
extends CritQueryDefinition<Task>

Type-safe implementation of a query definition. More complex example that shows how to use parameters. The method setParameters(TypedQuery) shows how to integrate with the parameter management done by the container. The method addPredicates(List, CriteriaBuilder, CriteriaQuery, Root) shows how to integrate with additional filtering that can be performed by the container.

Author:
jflamy
See Also:

Method Detail

addPredicates

protected List<javax.persistence.criteria.Predicate> addPredicates(List<javax.persistence.criteria.Predicate> filterExpressions,
                                                                   javax.persistence.criteria.CriteriaBuilder cb,
                                                                   javax.persistence.criteria.CriteriaQuery<?> cq,
                                                                   javax.persistence.criteria.Root<Task> t)
Define the WHERE clause conditions specific to this query. In this example, the CriteriaBuilder.parameter(Class) is used to define a parameter place holder. In such a case, the setParameters(TypedQuery) method must set the parameter values.

Overrides:
addPredicates in class CritQueryDefinition<Task>
Returns:

setParameters

public javax.persistence.TypedQuery<?> setParameters(javax.persistence.TypedQuery<?> tq)
Set values for the parameters used in the predicates. Should provide a value for all the parameter objects added in the addPredicates(List, CriteriaBuilder, CriteriaQuery, Root) method. Is expected to also call super() to handle named parameters defined through CritQueryDefinition.setNamedParameterValues(java.util.Map).

Overrides:
setParameters in class CritQueryDefinition<Task>
